items.title: Main Courses
items.description: Served Meals. All entrées include homemade rolls & butter, one [gourmet salad](#salad), one [starch](#starch), one [vegetable](#vegetable), & one [dessert](#sweets). Beverage service includes coffee, iced tea & iced water. For split menu _(Add $3.00 per person)_. For buffet choose additional salad & entrée _(Add $4.00 per person)_.

items.title: The Standard
items.description:
Choose one.
$32.95 for Lunch and $40.95 for Dinner _per person_.
Choose two options for a duet plate _(Add $3.00 per person)_.
